meanings.definition: A fluttering and colorful insect with large wings.
meanings.sent1: The butterflies danced gracefully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I saw many butterflies fluttering around the flowers.
meanings.sent3: The butterflies seemed to be having a party on the blossoms.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as vibrant as a group of butterflies in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The field was alive with the colors of the butterflies.

meanings.definition: A feeling of nervousness or excitement in the stomach.
meanings.sent1: Before the performance, I had butterflies in my stomach.
meanings.sent2: The job interview gave me butterflies.
meanings.sent3: The butterflies in my stomach were doing somersaults.
meanings.sent4: As the plane took off, the butterflies in my stomach soared.
meanings.sent5: The roller coaster ride filled me with butterflies.
